name: Rough Clean
description: Initial heavy-duty cleaning phase to remove major dirt, debris, and buildup

template.title: Rough Clean - Initial Deep Cleaning Phase
template.description: First phase of comprehensive cleaning focusing on removing heavy dirt, debris, and major buildup from all surfaces and areas.

tasks.name: Site Assessment & Preparation
tasks.notes: Initial walkthrough, identify problem areas, prepare equipment and supplies

tasks.name: Debris Removal & Decluttering
tasks.notes: Remove large debris, unwanted items, and clutter from all areas

tasks.name: Heavy Dust & Cobweb Removal
tasks.notes: Remove accumulated dust from high surfaces, ceiling fans, light fixtures, and corners

tasks.name: Floor Stripping & Initial Cleaning
tasks.notes: Strip old wax/finish, remove ground-in dirt, initial floor cleaning

tasks.name: Wall & Surface Scrubbing
tasks.notes: Scrub walls, baseboards, door frames, and other surfaces to remove buildup

tasks.name: Bathroom Deep Scrub
tasks.notes: Heavy-duty cleaning of toilets, showers, sinks, and tile grout

tasks.name: Kitchen/Break Room Degreasing
tasks.notes: Remove grease buildup from appliances, cabinets, and surfaces

tasks.name: Window Frame & Sill Cleaning
tasks.notes: Clean window frames, sills, and tracks of accumulated dirt
